text: I’m certainly not the person to make the call on whether we stand firm on the price, but since we don’t know what we’re ultimately building, nor does the other agency in the running, is there a situation where we say, if they have a hard budget and that’s the sticking point, could we scale the project to fit within that in a way that isn’t a deal killer for us doing quality work?
that is essentially the gist of our last communication with them! :blush:
I certainly hope things like this are not keeping you up at night? :thinking_face::sleeping:
it’s not keeping me up :slightly_smiling_face: I had to take justin to the starting line of his race at 5 today, so I had a good opportunity to catch up
